title: Full stack Blochchain Developer
content: Constructed a wide modular Python trading engine to auto- rebalance AppRecode 's $13M portfolio utilizing private and public market makers on the Ethereum network
Built 3 reusable cross-chain libraries and expanded the user base of the DeFi protocol by 37%
Completed 5 decentralized social media web applications using React, CSS, Bootstrap and web3.js/ethers.js based on Lens protocol for integrating Ethereum
Built a private blockchain using Hyperledger Fabric 1.0 that enhanced data security and reduced risk exposure by 92%

title: Python Data Scientist
content: Improved the accuracy of predicted prices by 21%
Upgraded data screaming processes for a 18% reduction in redundancy
Increased the usage and adoption of AI in 14 departments by implementing RESTful APIs to surface machine learning predictions.
Formulated an anomaly detection framework for 7 digital channels of Clevertech, reducing monthly loss avoidance by $21K

title: React Software Engineer
content: Completed 20+ front-end and back-end applications utilizing React.js, Node.js, and Typescript
Directed time-sensitive updates, such as changing content and upgrading databases.
